Improvements.Change_Diff:
- Map<String,ApiDoc> allMap=new HashMap<>(copyMap);
+ // Removed unnecessary copying
Improvements.Description: The method creates a new HashMap `allMap` as a copy of `copyMap`. However, any changes made to `copyMap` do not need to be reflected in `allMap`, so this copying is unnecessary and could be costly for large Maps. Instead, you can just iterate over `copyMap` directly.
In Java 8 and later, you can use method references to make your code more compact and readable. Instead of calling `StringUtil.trim(tag)`, you can use `tag::trim`.
